action_output_list: The user wants to disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts and add a specific number to the blocked list in the Messages app. First, I need to open the Messages app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Messages"}
To disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts, I need to access the settings menu. The "More options" button usually leads to settings.{"action_type": "click", "index": 20}

The user wants to disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts and add a specific number to the blocked list. The current screen shows the options menu. The next step is to click on "Settings" to access the settings menu.{"action_type": "click", "index": 26}

To disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts, I need to find the "Spam protection" setting. Since it's not visible on the screen, I need to scroll down.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down", "index": 9}
The current screen is the settings menu. To disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts, I need to click on "Spam protection".{"action_type": "click", "index": 46}

The goal is to disable blocking of messages from not stored contacts. The current screen shows the "Enable spam protection" setting, which is currently checked (enabled). To disable it, I need to click on the toggle button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 15}
Now that spam protection is disabled, I need to navigate back to the settings menu to find the option to block numbers.{"action_type": "navigate_back"}
To block a specific number, I need to navigate back to the main screen of the Messages app.{"action_type": "navigate_back"}
To block a number, I need to find the option to block contacts. I can try to access the "More options" menu again.{"action_type": "click", "index": 20}
The current screen shows the main Messages app interface. To block a number, I can access the "Spam & blocked" section from the options menu.{"action_type": "click", "index": 20}

The user wants to add a specific number to the blocked list. The current screen is "Spam & blocked". To block a number, I need to click on the "Block numbers" option.{"action_type": "click", "index": 9}

The goal is to add a specific number to the blocked list. The current screen shows an input field where a number can be entered to be blocked.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "1234567890", "index": 2}
The current screen shows the number entered to be blocked. The next step is to click the "Block" button to confirm blocking the number.{"action_type": "click", "index": 6}
